鍴字的基本解释

鍴
duān
钻。
觯，古代饮酒器。形似瓶，侈口，圈足。
锁。

鍴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duān］
［《廣韻》多官切，平桓，端。］
即觶。古饮酒器。瓶形，侈口，圈足。

鍴字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鍴； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1315第13
【廣韻】【集韻】?多官切，音端。【玉篇】鑽也。【揚子·方言】鑽謂之鍴。【註】音端。

鍴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鍴字的起名意思

指觯，古代饮酒器或锁。

Mongoose
Basic explanation of words
Mongoose
duān
Drill.
觯, the ancient drinking fountain. It looks like a bottle, has an extravagant mouth, and has round feet.
lock.
Mongoose
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duān］
["Guangyun" multi-official cut, Pinghuan, Duan. ]
That is. Ancient drinking fountain. Bottle-shaped, extravagant mouth, round feet.
Mongoose
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鍴; Kangxi strokes: 17; page number: page 1315 13
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Multi-official cut, sound end. [Jade articles] Drill also. 【Yangtze Dialect】Drilling is called mongoose. [Note] The sound terminal.
Mongoose
